data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Mandatory Follow-Up Lock. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
